# Vulpkanin
Vulpkanin are canine-like humanoids, sporting distinct ears and tails. They see the world in reds and greens, deal [color=#ec3a3a]blunt [/color]and [color=#ec3a3a]slash [/color] damage with their claws, and their fur isolates them environment temperature while making them 15% more vulnarable to Heat damage.
